searchQuery.query:
// Count error logs per app & subsystem in the last 24 hours
source logs between @'now' - 24h and @'now'
| filter $m.severity == ERROR
| groupby $l.applicationname as application, $l.subsystemname as subsystem aggregate count() as error_count_last_24h
| create dummy_key from 'comparison'
| join (
    // Count error logs per app & subsystem from 48h to 24h ago
    source logs between @'now' - 48h and @'now' - 24h
    | filter $m.severity == ERROR
    | groupby $l.applicationname as application, $l.subsystemname as subsystem aggregate count() as error_count_prev_24h
    | create dummy_key from 'comparison'
  )
  on left=>dummy_key == right=>dummy_key
   && left=>application == right=>application
   && left=>subsystem == right=>subsystem
  into copies
| create change from error_count_last_24h - copies.error_count_prev_24h
| choose application,
         subsystem,
         copies.error_count_prev_24h as error_count_prev_24h,
         error_count_last_24h,
         change
